Description: Rim and handle zone sherd of Attic black-figured pottery band-cup with flaring rim; interior: glazed; exterior: lip black; handle zone reserved with single letter of painted inscription.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1982 / Painted Pottery from the Greek Mainland found in Egypt, 640-450 BC (p. 412, no. B632)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0476) (Phase 1)
